name: Court Mess
description:
In this game, your main objective is to solve the maximum number of cases in the shortest possible time. You will be able to ask the defendants questions to get more information about the case or convict them from the beginning.

Watch out! Once you close the case, you will not be able to change your choice and the accused will be sentenced to death if declared as guilty.

However, if you declare the accused as innocent and he was actually guilty, you now have set a criminal free. Both cases will decrease score points.

The only way to earn points is by declaring the cases correctly and finishing as soon as possible.

Good luck, don't let any weirdo escape!
